_header: Sweet heart I love you more fervent than my father
Subjects: love letters; love, vicissitudes of; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: A letter from a lady to her fickle lover — two 8-line stanzas

BodRawC813.First Lines:
Swet harte I loue yow more feruent then my faderyet knowe I wyll
                    your loue Soo feruent ys…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…but for all thys I shall doo my deverto loue yow well butt
                    trust ye me for euer
